articles.title: Scientists Discover Bizarre 380 Million-Year-Old Ancient Fish That Breathed Air - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The rivers of Australia, which once flowed across its now dry interior, used to host a range of bizarre animals - including a sleek predatory lobe-finned fish with large fangs and bony scales. The newly described fossil fish discovered in remote fossil fields…
articles.content: Life reconstruction of Harajicadectes zhumini, a 40 cm long lobe-finned fish that is not too distantly related to the fishes that gave rise to the earliest limbed tetrapods. Credit: Brian Choo, Flind… [+4411 chars]

articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Negative padosi': Irfan Pathan slams Pakistan fans for mocking India's defeat in the U19 World Cup final - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Former all-rounder Irfan Pathan criticizes Pakistan fans for taunting India's defeat in the U19 World Cup final against Australia. Read more about his response and the impact of such behavior on Pakistan as a nation.

articles.author: Shreyashi Sanyal
articles.title: Asia markets open mixed to start holiday-shortened week - CNBC
articles.description: Many major stock markets in Asia-Pacific were closed Monday including Hong Kong, Taiwan and South Korea. Australia closed lower, while New Zealand dollar inched down.
articles.content:
A general view of market boards at the ASX Exchange Centre in Sydney, Australia.
Asia markets were mixed Monday to start a holiday-shortened week for most markets, while China remains shut for the w… [+1409 chars]
